## Type of Change

Please delete options that are not relevant.

- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Security fix
- [ ] Accessibility improvement

## Checklist

Please review and check all items before requesting a review.

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed any console.logs or debug statements

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on multiple browsers (if frontend)
- [ ] I have tested with screen readers (if UI changes)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation (README, docs/) to reflect my changes
- [ ] I have added docstrings/comments to new functions and classes
- [ ] I have updated the API documentation (if backend changes)

### Accessibility

- [ ] I have tested keyboard navigation (if UI changes)
- [ ] I have verified color contrast meets WCAG AA standards (if UI changes)
- [ ] I have added appropriate ARIA labels (if UI changes)
- [ ] I have tested with screen readers (if UI changes)

### Security

- [ ] I have not introduced any security vulnerabilities (SQL injection, XSS, etc.)
- [ ] I have not exposed any sensitive information (API keys, secrets)
- [ ] I have validated all user inputs
- [ ] I have implemented proper authentication/authorization checks

### Database (if applicable)

- [ ] I have created migrations for database schema changes
- [ ] Migrations are reversible (have both upgrade and downgrade)
- [ ] I have tested migrations on a local database

## Additional Context

Add any other context about the pull request here.

## Deployment Notes

Are there any special deployment steps or environment variable changes required?

## Breaking Changes

If this PR introduces breaking changes, describe them here and provide a migration guide.

## For Reviewers

### Review Focus Areas

Please pay special attention to:

- [ ] Performance implications
- [ ] Security considerations
- [ ] Edge cases and error handling
- [ ] Accessibility compliance
- [ ] Code maintainability

### Review Checklist

- [ ] Code is clear and understandable
- [ ] Tests adequately cover the changes
- [ ] Documentation is complete and accurate
- [ ] No obvious security issues
- [ ] Accessibility requirements are met (if applicable)
